article_title: New Estimate Of Obamacare's Fiscal Impact On Private Doctor Practices

article_metadata.description: Under Obamacare, doctors have been strained by costly new regulations, intricate payment “reforms” that tie their Medicare reimbursement to complex federal reporting requirements, and mandates that they install and make “meaningful” use of electronic health records. Add a new burden to the mix: The proportion of patients they see are rapidly [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
